TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartMenuStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartMenuStyle Inherits TableStyle Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor
public ref class WebPartMenuStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle, System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 包含 控件上的菜单的样式属性。

span.span: Contains style characteristics for menus on controls.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实质上是对象，它包含要将应用于菜单上的样式特征控件。The class is essentially a object, which contains style characteristics to apply to menus on controls. Web 部件控件集使用对象上确定谓词菜单的样式特性控件。The Web Parts control set uses the object to determine the style characteristics of the verbs menu on a control. 每个标题栏中包含的谓词菜单控件，并且包括各种用户界面 (UI) 操作 （称作谓词），用户可以执行，例如，关闭、 最小化、 导出或删除控件。A verbs menu is contained in the title bar of each control, and it includes various user interface (UI) actions (called verbs) that users can perform, such as closing, minimizing, exporting, or deleting a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您可以对设置样式特性对象，并因此上的所有谓词菜单区域，通过使用中的控件属性区域。You can set style attributes on the object, and thus on the verbs menu of all the controls in a zone, by using the property on a zone. 类具有两个重要属性。The class has two important properties. 第一种是属性，确定是否菜单的内容对齐在左侧，中心，或未设置该控件或对齐方式的权利。The first is the property, which determines whether the content of the menu is aligned on the left, the center, or the right of the control or the alignment is not set. 属性确定菜单的阴影颜色上控制，如果在用户的系统上启用了菜单阴影功能。The property determines the color of the shadow for the menu on a control, if the menu shadowing feature is enabled on the user's system. 类还具有一些关键的方法。The class also has some critical methods. 方法将样式对象传递到方法中，复制非空样式元素并将它们应用于对象，并覆盖任何现有的进程中的样式元素。The method copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed into the method, and applies them to the object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process. 方法同样会复制非空样式元素从样式对象传递给方法，但它不会覆盖现有的样式元素中对象。The method similarly copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed to the method, but it does not overwrite existing style elements in the object. 方法移除从任何已定义的样式元素对象的状态包。The method removes any defined style elements from the object's state bag. 类还实现中包含的所有方法接口。The class also implements all the methods contained in the interface. 通常情况下，这使类应用于不同类型的菜单。In general, this enables the class to be applied to different types of menus.

Public Overrides Sub CopyFrom (s As Style)

span.span: A that contains style information to copy.

summary.span: 将非空样式元素复制到 对象，覆盖进程中的所有现有样式元素。

span.span: Copies nonblank style elements to the object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将从指定的样式信息对象，以及是否有中的任何现有样式元素实例，它将覆盖它们。The method copies style information from the specified object, and if there are any existing style elements in the instance, it overwrites them. > [!NOTE] > 此方法重写其基方法的其中一个原因是自定义将分配到的值的过程属性。One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void FillStyleAttributes (System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection attributes, System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver);

public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property HorizontalAlign As HorizontalAlign

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign value); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 控件上的菜单内容要使用哪种水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets a value indicating what type of horizontal alignment to use for the content of a menu on a control.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该枚举值指定要使用的对齐方式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies what type of alignment to use.

value.span: 默认值可从基 属性值获取。

span.span: The default value is obtained from the base property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写以防止从要设置的对齐方式，以及将某些属性添加到属性的基属性。The property overrides the base property to prevent the alignment from being set, and to add some attributes to the property. 属性获取其值的基属性值，但不提供 setter，任何实现，因此，不能使用此属性来设置菜单内容的对齐方式。The property gets its value from the base property value, but does not provide any implementation for the setter, so you cannot set the alignment of the menu content by using this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

span.span: A that contains style information to copy.

summary.span: 将非空样式元素复制到 实例，但不覆盖现有样式元素。

span.span: Copies nonblank style elements to the instance, but does not overwrite existing style elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法类似于是中它将从指定复制样式元素的方法对象，但它不同之处在于它不会覆盖所有现有样式元素实例。The method is similar to the method in that it copies style elements from a specified object, but it differs in that it does not overwrite any existing style elements in the instance. > [!NOTE] > 此方法重写其基方法的其中一个原因是自定义将分配到的值的过程属性。One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 从 对象的状态袋中移除所有已定义的样式元素。

span.span: Removes any defined style elements from the object's state bag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法非常类似于中的基本方法是类。The method is very similar to the base method in the class. 之后的某些自定义处理属性，此方法只需调用基方法，以从状态包中删除任何剩余的样式元素。After some custom handling for the property, this method simply calls the base method to remove any remaining style elements from the state bag.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ShadowColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定 控件上菜单的阴影颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the shadow color for a menu on a control.
A that determines the shadow color.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅在用户具有在其系统上启用了 Microsoft Windows 菜单阴影功能时，才起作用。The property takes effect only when users have the Microsoft Windows menu-shadowing feature enabled on their systems. 启用菜单阴影后，属性设置菜单内容周围创建阴影的颜色。When menu shadowing is enabled, the property sets the color of the shadow that is created around the menu content. 如果没有颜色值分配给属性，没有卷影将显示在菜单中，即使在系统上启用了菜单阴影。If no color value is assigned to the property, no shadow will appear on menus, even if menu shadowing is enabled on the system.
